derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin delinquentia, from Latin delinquent- 'offending' (see delinquent)

entry.tran: (尤指青少年的)违法行为，犯罪行为
entry.def: Delinquency is criminal behaviour, especially that of young people.

example.ex: He had no history of delinquency.
...a whole range of crimes and delinquencies.

entry.tran: 逾期未还债务（或未缴税款）
entry.def: Delinquency is failure to pay a debt or tax.

example.ex: Not all delinquencies lead to foreclosure.
example.tran: 并不是所有未按时还债的情形都会导致丧失抵押品的赎回权。
抵押贷款拖欠率的上升
